config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration is used in the journal() method to determine the size threshold for the journal. If the system is not in transient mode, a PersistentJournal is created with the specified _journalSizeThreshold.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalSizeThreshold configuration depends on how often the journal() method is called in the system. If the method is called frequently, the configuration will be triggered frequently as well.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalSizeThreshold configuration on the system is significant as it determines the size threshold for the journal. Setting a higher threshold may result in larger journal files and potentially impact system performance and disk space usage.
